Test.sq line 29:9 - Ambiguous column name team, found in tables [one, hockey_player]
  15    subqueries_for_days:
  16    SELECT *
  17    FROM hockey_player AS one
  18    JOIN (
  19      SELECT *
  20      FROM (
  21        SELECT *
  22        FROM (
  23          SELECT *
  24          FROM hockey_player
  25          WHERE hockey_player._id = one._id
  26        )
  27      )
  28    )
  29    GROUP BY team
                 ^^^^
